sentences.en: Copy of the refinery commitment to produce the product.
sentences.cn: 炼油厂提供的供货承诺.

sentences.en: Dewatering and desalting in electric dewatering plant in oil refinery.
sentences.cn: 炼油厂电脱盐装置的脱水、脱盐.

sentences.en: Have we heard back from our ut that was sent out to the refinery?
sentences.cn: 派到炼油厂的特工发回信息了 吗 ?

sentences.en: In March Mr Salinas shut down the city's oil refinery at a cost of $500 million and 5,000 jobs.
sentences.cn: 3月份，萨利纳斯先生关闭了该市的炼油场，造成5亿美元的损失，并使5,000人失去了工作。

sentences.en: In only one refinery asphalt did represent more than 75 % of production.
sentences.cn: 仅有一家精炼厂的沥青占其产品总量高于75%.

sentences.en: Others another Refinery an income boost, but personally I prefer the Refinery.
sentences.cn: 还有得喜欢再造个矿厂增加收入, 但偶个人推荐矿厂.

sentences.en: Refinery and petrochemical operation produce a variety of byproduct gases.
sentences.cn: 炼油厂和石油化工生产中生成各种副产气体.

sentences.en: She's found a fuel refinery ship filled with Tylium.
sentences.cn: 她发现一艘燃料船,船上装满了超级锂.

sentences.en: The Fluid Catalytic Cracking ( FCC ) is the major gasoline - producing process in refinery.
sentences.cn: FCC(流化催化裂化 ) 是炼厂生产汽油的主要方法之一.

sentences.en: The oil is carried to the oil refinery by pipelines.
sentences.cn: 石油通过输油管输送到炼油厂.

sentences.en: The pipeline links the refinery with the port.
sentences.cn: 管道将炼油厂与港口连接起来.

sentences.en: The purpose of oil refinery is to refine crude petroleum.
sentences.cn: 炼油厂的主要工作是提炼原油.
他们建起了一座榨糖厂.

sentences.en: They have to put up with a giant oil refinery right on their doorstep.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不忍受就在家门口的巨型炼油厂。

sentences.en: World Collapse In Fuel Demand Likely To Halt Refinery Construction.
sentences.cn: 油价急挫全球逾五分之四炼油项目下马.
